name: GallbladderXRay
title: Gallbladder X Ray
description: Note - "This value set may undergo changes until the HL7 Multiple Chronic Care FHIR IG is formally published in 2024."
purpose: (Clinical Focus: These terms may be used when reporting a result associated with Gallbladder X-ray or may be used to represent the procedure.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify Gallbladder X-ray performed or resulted on a patient or identify patients who have had Gallbladder Tract X-ray performed or resulted.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes LOINC codes specific to Gallbladder X-ray tests.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes Gallbladder X-ray codes that are precoordinated with body sites other than the biliary duct or gallbladder.)

contains.display: XR Biliary ducts and Gallbladder Views W contrast IV
XR Gallbladder Views W contrast PO
XR Gallbladder Views 48H post contrast PO
XR Gallbladder Views W contrast and fatty meal PO
